description: Mike has always been very open-minded. The first time I met him, he told me he would agree to do an Office Suck scene as long as he wore the mask. He's a very sexual dude and even though he's straight, he enjoyed a lot the blowjob I gave him. Here's some extra and never-seen footage of that classic scene. Enjoy!
title: Never Seen - Office Suck 4, Scene #01
